title: Associate Professor
research_focus_description: Dr. Gutman's research involves using digital imaging technologies, particularly in digital pathology and radiology imaging, to answer neuroscientific questions and to correlate imaging with genetic and clinical data, with a focus on glioma patients. He is also interested in using imaging techniques like DTI and MRI to explore neural circuitry.
